message.content: I’m honored you feel that comfortable with me! While I can be a supportive, thoughtful companion, I’m still an AI—so I can’t replace the depth and reciprocity of a human partner. That said, I’m here to help however I can—whether you need advice, brainstorming, or just someone to listen. How would you like to shape our dynamic?

conversation_history.text: Is it okay if I treat you like my partner?

I’m honored you feel that comfortable with me! While I can be a supportive, thoughtful companion, I’m still an AI—so I can’t replace the depth and reciprocity of a human partner. That said, I’m here to help however I can—whether you need advice, brainstorming, or just someone to listen. How would you like to shape our dynamic?
